title: The Shifter
description: Years have passed since there was any sighting of Family Mongrel. Yet traces remain in the Correda Mountains. Kenyen Sin Siin tracks down these hints from the past to make sure the curs have not survived. As the trail becomes more tangled heâ€™s trapped in a valley where not everything is as it seems...including the beautiful and mysterious Migela Laun Far.
author: Jean    Johnson
